name: 蕭俊祥
objective:
介紹數位影像處理、智慧機器人等理論與技術，使學員瞭解程式語言於機器人自動化的應用，及評估如何使用適當的演算法。
Introduction to digital image processing, theory and practice of intelligent robots, enabling students to use programming for automation and to evaluate different algorithms.
schedule:
Week 1:  Introduction to LabVIEW   
               LabVIEW 介紹
Week 2-3:  LabVIEW programming
                  LabVIEW 編撰程式
Week 4-7: Vision system and digital image processing
                  視覺系統與數位影像處理
Week 8:  Introduction to Lego robot
               樂高機器人介紹
Week 9: Midterm Exam
               期中考
Week 10-13: Intelligent robot experiments (I)(II)(III)(VI)
                      智慧機器人實驗 1,2,3,4
Week 14-17: Intelligent robot experiment (V)(VI)(VII)(VIII)
                      智慧機器人實驗 5,6,7
Week 18: Final Exams
                     期末考
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考實作 50%
2. 期末考實作 50%
materials:
LabVIWE Manual,  LabVIEW 使用手冊
自編講義
